name: ERISLE
description: is an ARPG created with the Unity5 game engine by an independent team. It combines currency and health into the same value to create unique changes in numbers and a brand new gaming experience. We made a bold decision in designing the game’s stats system, where a player’s Shield (powered by energy),Ammunition and in-game currency are all...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows7 8 10 Processor: CPU: I5 3450 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX960 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows7 8 10 Processor: CPU: I5 3450 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space
